channel.title: [666] Murion - High Quality Content Based Of 2011 RuneScape
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Fb0MYl4.png[/img]
Staff List: • Aero (Founder) • SonicForce41 (CEO) • Emily (Content Developer) • Bence (Social Media Manager) • Omega (Web Developer) • Johannes (Community Manager)
Website:
Recent Updates: [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A-zVf8W9ZXQ]Grand Exchange[/url] [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NbQUKMNjtPg]Level Up Fireworks[/url]
The following Skills have been added: • Fishing, • Woodcutting, • Summoning, • Runecrafting, • Herblore (re-done), • Fletching (re-done), • Firemaking,
• Forum integration software has been completed, which connects the game world to the forums, • A quest system has been created, • A cutscene system has also been created, • A change to the way game objects work in game, • NPCAttribute editing system, • NPC creating system, • Familiar system, • Auras, • Game portal manager, • Control panel server manager which allows developers to control the server from external machines/phones, • NPC drop system (including rare table), • Gravestones, • Correct combat colouring, • Head icon manager, • Widget manager was re-done, • Game input submission system, • Routefinder has been re-worked (Unreachable actors/nodes will now stop interactions from occuring (no more trading npcs through walls)), • Lot's more bug fixes.
Early Development Media: [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2dm7g5c.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/21vfib.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/2ev7ouh.png[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/f3roe0.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2metqx0.png[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/2dsitcl.png[/img]
Media: [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2zdvujt.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/gTrTZJ7.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/MoDtgFo.png[/img] [/center]

item.title: [666] Murion - High Quality Content Based Of 2011 RuneScape
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

@liamp
Do you know when the 666 revision was released? September 15 of 2011 was the official release date of the 666 revision. Please have relevant facts supporting your statement before you post.
Source: http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Build_number

@zuppers
It’s not an advertisement. I’m showing the media for our development. Alright, I will seek permission from the moderator to post website.

Read full topic
item.source: [666] Murion - High Quality Content Based Of 2011 RuneScape

item.title: [666] Murion - High Quality Content Based Of 2011 RuneScape

@liamp wrote:

how is this Based Of 2011 RuneScape ? when its a 666 base and has some stuff that rs didn’t have back in 2011?

item.title: [666] Murion - High Quality Content Based Of 2011 RuneScape
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

[center]

Staff List:
• Aero (Founder)
• SonicForce41 (CEO)
• Emily (Content Developer)
• Bence (Social Media Manager)
• Omega (Web Developer)
• Johannes (Community Manager)

Website:

Recent Updates:
Grand Exchange
Level Up Fireworks

The following Skills have been added:
• Fishing,
• Woodcutting,
• Summoning,
• Runecrafting,
• Herblore (re-done),
• Fletching (re-done),
• Firemaking,

• Forum integration software has been completed, which connects the game world to the forums,
• A quest system has been created,
• A cutscene system has also been created,
• A change to the way game objects work in game,
• NPCAttribute editing system,
• NPC creating system,
• Familiar system,
• Auras,
• Game portal manager,
• Control panel server manager which allows developers to control the server from external machines/phones,
• NPC drop system (including rare table),
• Gravestones,
• Correct combat colouring,
• Head icon manager,
• Widget manager was re-done,
• Game input submission system,
• Routefinder has been re-worked (Unreachable actors/nodes will now stop interactions from occuring (no more trading npcs through walls)),
• Lot’s more bug fixes.

Early Development Media:
